text:
Investing in a quality leather or suede skirt is high on the list of style-savvy girls. Zip-front, mini, maxi and more, it’s something you’ll find yourself wearing season after season.

Not ready to shell out for the genuine thing? We’ve tricks up our sleeve to get the look of leather at all ends of the spectrum.

Top 10 sites for leather and suede skirts online ASOS

Express

Nordstrom

Amazon

H&M Macy's

Boohoo

1. ASOS

Giddy-up to this UK retailer for premium leather and suede — and skirts that only look it. ASOS is the ultimate fashion destination for the 20-something fashion addict with a mix of exclusive styles and hot brands. Student discount.

Free shipping on orders of $49.99 or more.

Free returns.

Plus sizes available. Go to ASOS website View coupon codes for ASOS

2. Express

For a beautiful skirt that's cruelty free, try this mall favorite. Express offers a line of (Minus the) Leather skirts to keep you looking cool. Free shipping on orders of $50 or more. Go to Express website View coupon codes for Express

3. Nordstrom

For genuine leather, this trusted department store is a top choice. Nordstrom focuses its collections on quality brands. That's important when when investing in your wardrobe with a new leather or suede skirt. Free shipping on every order.

Free returns.

Plus sizes available. Go to Nordstrom website View coupon codes for Nordstrom

4. Amazon

Top-notch or cheap, this marketplace giant's got your leather look. Amazon carries genuine and faux leather skirts from $15 to well over $150 in an array of styles and sizes. Free shipping on orders of $25 or more.

Free returns on select orders.

Large plus-size selection. Go to Amazon website View coupon codes for Amazon

5. H&M

Your selection of leather may vary, but the savings are solid. Score faux leather skirts in patent and nonglossy finishes for under $10 at H&M. Frequent free-shipping deals.

Plus sizes available. Go to H&M website View coupon codes for H&M

6. Boohoo

Your perfect Kardashian-style faux leather skirt is just a few clicks away. Offering hundreds of fashion-forward options starting at just $10, you'll love the UK import Boohoo. Free returns.

Plus sizes available. Go to Boohoo website View coupon codes for Boohoo

7. Target

Surprise yourself with a selection of faux leather skirts for a pittance. Check the Target app for extra savings and to keep your eye on a selection of trendy and classic skirts. Free shipping on orders of $35 or more.

Free returns.

Plus sizes available. Go to Target website View coupon codes for Target

8. PrettyLittleThing

Faux leather skirts ready to party — or maybe show off at the coolest bar in town. Features like embroidery and appliqués set PrettyLittlleThing's cute leather-look skirts apart from the crowd. Plus sizes available. Go to PrettyLittleThing website View coupon codes for PrettyLittleThing

9. Kohl's

You never know what you'll find at this savings mecca. Kohl's carries real and faux leather skirts with multiple ways to save. Pro tip: Check out juniors for a bigger selection of cute, trendy options. Free shipping on orders of $75 or more.

Large plus-size selection. Go to Kohl's website View coupon codes for Kohl's
